info.title: AdSense Host
info.description: Generates performance reports, generates ad codes, and provides publisher management capabilities for AdSense Hosts.

get.description: List hosted accounts associated with this AdSense account by ad client id

parameters.name: filterAdClientId
parameters.description: Ad clients to list accounts for

get.description: Get information about the selected associated AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account to get information about

get.description: List all hosted ad clients in the specified hosted account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account for which to list ad clients

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of ad clients to include in the response, used for paging

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token, used to page through ad clients

get.description: Get information about one of the ad clients in the specified publisher's AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad client

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client to get

get.description: List all ad units in the specified publisher's AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad client

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client for which to list ad units

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Whether to include inactive ad units

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of ad units to include in the response, used for paging

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token, used to page through ad units

patch.description: Update the supplied ad unit in the specified publisher AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad client

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client which contains the ad unit

parameters.name: adUnitId
parameters.description: Ad unit to get

post.description: Insert the supplied ad unit into the specified publisher AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which will contain the ad unit

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client into which to insert the ad unit

put.description: Update the supplied ad unit in the specified publisher AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad client

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client which contains the ad unit

delete.description: Delete the specified ad unit from the specified publisher AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad unit

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client for which to get ad unit

parameters.name: adUnitId
parameters.description: Ad unit to delete

get.description: Get the specified host ad unit in this AdSense account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad unit

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client for which to get ad unit

parameters.name: adUnitId
parameters.description: Ad unit to get

get.description: Get ad code for the specified ad unit, attaching the specified host custom channels

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account which contains the ad client

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client with contains the ad unit

parameters.name: adUnitId
parameters.description: Ad unit to get the code for

parameters.name: hostCustomChannelId
parameters.description: Host custom channel to attach to the ad code

get.description: Generate an AdSense report based on the report request sent in the query parameters

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Hosted account upon which to report

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Dimensions to base the report on

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End of the date range to report on in
format, inclusive

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters to be run on the report

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Optional locale to use for translating report output to a local language

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of rows of report data to return

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Numeric columns to include in the report

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The name of a dimension or metric to sort the resulting report on, optionally prefixed with
to sort ascending or
to sort descending

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start of the date range to report on in
format, inclusive

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first row of report data to return

get.description: List all host ad clients in this AdSense account

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of ad clients to include in the response, used for paging

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token, used to page through ad clients

get.description: Get information about one of the ad clients in the Host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client to get

get.description: List all host custom channels in this AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client for which to list custom channels

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of custom channels to include in the response, used for paging

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token, used to page through custom channels

patch.description: Update a custom channel in the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client in which the custom channel will be updated

parameters.name: customChannelId
parameters.description: Custom channel to get

post.description: Add a new custom channel to the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client to which the new custom channel will be added

put.description: Update a custom channel in the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client in which the custom channel will be updated

delete.description: Delete a specific custom channel from the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client from which to delete the custom channel

parameters.name: customChannelId
parameters.description: Custom channel to delete

get.description: Get a specific custom channel from the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client from which to get the custom channel

parameters.name: customChannelId
parameters.description: Custom channel to get

get.description: List all host URL channels in the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client for which to list URL channels

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of URL channels to include in the response, used for paging

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A continuation token, used to page through URL channels

post.description: Add a new URL channel to the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client to which the new URL channel will be added

delete.description: Delete a URL channel from the host AdSense account

parameters.name: adClientId
parameters.description: Ad client from which to delete the URL channel

parameters.name: urlChannelId
parameters.description: URL channel to delete

get.description: Create an association session for initiating an association with an AdSense user

parameters.name: productCode
parameters.description: Products to associate with the user

parameters.name: userLocale
parameters.description: The preferred locale of the user

parameters.name: websiteLocale
parameters.description: The locale of the user's hosted website

parameters.name: websiteUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the user's hosted website

get.description: Verify an association session after the association callback returns from AdSense signup

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token returned to the association callback URL

get.description: Generate an AdSense report based on the report request sent in the query parameters

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Dimensions to base the report on

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End of the date range to report on in
format, inclusive

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters to be run on the report

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Optional locale to use for translating report output to a local language

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of rows of report data to return

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Numeric columns to include in the report

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The name of a dimension or metric to sort the resulting report on, optionally prefixed with
to sort ascending or
to sort descending

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start of the date range to report on in
format, inclusive

parameters.name: startIndex
